summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 4.5 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 224 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1807 m), feels like temperature (up 2.8°C), outside temperature (up 2.8°C), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and near calm conditions. Periods of rain anticipated, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and the light is absent. Weather could become unsettled.
